"Ah, <%me>. You did good.": "Our selfish circumstances made way for the [Profound Darkness] to embroil the entire universe."
"We pushed Dark Falz and the [Profound Darkness] onto you all. We involved people who had nothing to do with it."
"Yet despite that, you all did what we couldn't. You've done so many magnificent things for us."
"So, at the very least, I'd like to give you my thanks."
"Thank you, for defeating the [Profound Darkness] on our behalf."

"It doesn't affect me personally, but I am one of the Twenty Gods, after all. I also have responsibilities I need to own up to."
